location.name: Arohy

name: Guzishta: Traces of Yesterday A reunion set by Ankit & Shobhit

offers.description:
Limited slots. Reserved for those who believe in beginnings before the crowd does. Be among the first to relive the echoes of a shared past. Expect raw emotions, unreleased originals, and memories you didn’t know you missed.
This ticket gives you exclusive access to Guzishta — a soul-stirring evening of music, poetry, and heartfelt storytelling by Ankit & Shobhit, coming together on stage for the first time after years of friendship and jamming in the shadows.
offers.name: Early bird

offers.description:
Guzishta – Saath Safar (Group of 2 Pass) Because some journeys are meant to be felt together. Bring your closest ones and experience Guzishta as it was meant to be — shared. This ticket admits two people to an evening of music, poetry, stories, and emotions that stretch across time.  Whether you’re friends, family, or fellow seekers of forgotten songs — come sit together, sway together, and remember together.
Includes: 	•	Full entry for 2 attendees 	•	Reserved seating in a shared row (subject to availability) 	•	A special group offer price — memories are better multiplied  Because nostalgia, like music, resonates deeper when it echoes through more than one heart.
offers.name: Group Ticket
